name: Carson's American Bistro
advisory: Notice: These items may be raw, undercooked or cooked to order. Ask your server about menu items that are cooked to order or served raw. Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness. Please notify us of food allergies. Not responsible for personal property. All menu items and pricing on our menu are subject to change, without notice based on availability and market price.

items.name: Bistro Chips
items.description: house-made chips, roasted garlic, applewood smoked bacon, cheddar and blue cheeses

items.name: Crispy Fried Brussels Sprouts
items.description: flash fried, shaved parmesan, pecans, maple balsamic glaze

items.name: The Carson's Wedge
items.description: double wedge of iceberg lettuce, tomato, applewood smoked bacon, blue cheese dressing

items.name: Carson's Chopped Salad
items.description: grilled chicken, avocado, tomatoes, blue cheese, eggs, scallions, bacon, corn, crispy tortilla strips.

items.name: Thai Chicken Salad
items.description: grilled chicken, greens, peanuts, edamame, peppers, crispy wontons, ginger-lime-cilantro vinaigrette

items.name: House Salad
items.description: mixed greens, tomato, cucumber, blue cheese, tossed with our house vinaigrette

categories.name: Sandwiches
categories.description: includes fries and blue cheese coleslaw, add cup of soup for 3.95. burgers include lettuce, tomato, choice of Vermont cheddar, blue cheese, jalapeno jack cheese, swiss, caramelized onions on a choice of our traditional, whole wheat or whole wheat "skinny" bun applewood smoked bacon add 1.00

items.name: Carson's Bistro Burger
items.description: half pound of 100% USDA prime beef

items.name: Bison Burger
items.description: lean ground American bison, high in omega-3, iron, protein and other nutrients, and lower in calories

items.name: Grilled Chicken Club
items.description: lettuce, tomato, applewood smoked bacon, avocado, jalapeno jack cheese, herb mayonnaise

items.name: Fish Tacos
items.description: warm corn tortilla, spice rubbed lemon sole, red cabbage slaw, roasted corn relish

items.name: Prime Rib Dip
items.description: sliced prime rib, Swiss cheese, horsey sauce, on ciabatta roll, house-made au jus

categories.name: Fresh Catch
categories.description: Choose grilled, broiled or blackened, and select a sauce: sweet chili sauce, avocado mango salsa or housemade tartar sauce. Served with broccoli and couscous. Lunch portions are available until 5pm.
